title: 35,000 MT of Fuel today (24) under Indian Credit
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Energy said that another ship carrying 35,000 MT of 92 Octane fuel under the Indian loan assistance will reach Sri Lanka on Thursday (24).
However, people continue to wait in queues at filling stations to obtain Diesel and Kerosene as the fuel crisis remains unresolved.
According to the News 1st Correspondent, from Wednesday (23) night, long queues were seen at filling stations across the country.
